meanings.definition: Think out, plan, or devise (something) by careful thought.
meanings.sent1: She excogitates a new strategy for the project.
meanings.sent2: He excogitates the best way to solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent3: The team excogitates a fun team-building activity.
meanings.sent4: The artist excogitates a masterpiece in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The scientist excogitates a groundbreaking theory.

meanings.sent1: He excogitates the consequences of his actions.
meanings.sent2: She excogitates on the meaning of life.
meanings.sent3: The student excogitates on which college to attend.
meanings.sent4: The philosopher excogitates the nature of reality.
meanings.sent5: The thinker excogitates deeply before making decisions.
